description:
I build open source natural Language toolkit for thai language.
Description: I am a PyThaiNLP founder. PyThaiNLP is a python module similar to nltk , but it's working primarily on Thai language instead of English. It supports both Python 2.7 and Python 3.
GitHub : https://github.com/PyThaiNLP/pythainlp


------------

Bio:
I am a PyThaiNLP founder.
title: PyThaiNLP : Thai natural language processing in Python.
